TopicTitle: Can't get any crew reports, mysterious goo etc to work

Articles.Content:
Hi all. It's been a while since I've played the game, but for some reason all of a sudden I can't interact with my mysterious goo containers or take down crew reports. If I hover over the mysterious goo, nothing happens. 

 

I'm playing the latest version (1.0.5.1028) on a Mac. Not sure if I'm doing something wrong or not. Anyone have any insight?

Edited December 20, 2015 by TheUnfocusedOne
Did you open the parts action menu?  I think it's command+click on a Mac.

Yep, I've tried that. No pop ups.

So maybe some other things have changed, but you used to be able to take crew reports, etc at all altitudes, including on the launch pad. Is that still true?

Ha. never mind I've figured it out. It's something weird with the touch pad. Apparently, command+click on a touchpad it doesnt work, but if you use a mouse and right click the parts action menu comes up. Those two things should be equivalent. Not sure if that's by design or not.

 

Thanks for the help!
Hmm, maybe your pad allows for two finger tapping like mine does for right click, worth a shot.
